sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MultisourceReports</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MultisourceReports</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MultisourceReports = Class.create();
MultisourceReports.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getLastExecutionId: function(savedQueryId) {
		var executionStatus = sn_cmdb.MultiSourceAnalytics.getLastExecution(savedQueryId);
		var executionStatusObj = JSON.parse(executionStatus);
		var executionIdFromAPI='';
		if(executionStatusObj.valid == true){
			executionIdFromAPI = executionStatusObj.executionId;
		}
        var executionId = "execution_id.sys_id=" + executionIdFromAPI;
        return executionId;
    },
    type: 'MultisourceReports'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-08 19:46:50</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3795b7e077f20110085c067f5b5a9908</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MultisourceReports</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">c60efc0f6d2220100acb70b3534330c0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3795b7e077f20110085c067f5b5a9908</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-19 00:45:04</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>563</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
